/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Parked cars line the sides of the street, adding to the sense of a busy, populated area. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a cityscape that is both vibrant and serene.
